main event: Observer had 3 different UFO sightings in one night on June 4, 1969.
interesting points: The observer saw a light that seemed to follow them home,The light was described as 'big as a snowball',The light moved about but returned to roughly the same location multiple times,Three triangular objects were seen during or after the light disappeared,The observer has not returned the requested AF Form 117 as of November 1969.
sighted object: a light and three triangular objects
